description:
Does the thought of giving a presentation put you on edge? Are you worried about boring your audience or missing the target with your presentation? Storytelling goes farther than data & facts when you want to embed meaning into your communications. Improve your business communications with storytelling to deliver engaging presentations that everyone will remember. Whether you're a new presenter or a seasoned professional, our storytelling and key presentation details will help you build confidence & turn a boring â€œtell-em" presentation into a convincing call to action.

Course 1: Tell Your Business Story

Put the principles of story composition to work to embed meaning into your communications and achieve your business goals.

  • Capture the Elements of Storytelling
  • Engage Your Audience
  • Craft Your Story

Course 2: Deliver Engaging Presentations

In this course you'll learn to deliver rich & engaging presentations by applying storytelling & design principles to captivate your listeners and get results.

  • Connect with People & Command Attention
  • Find the Story in Your Data
  • Illustrate with Images & Diagrams
  • Develop Polished Presentation Skills

This two course bundle will teach you how to apply business storytelling techniques & engage in simple graphic design skills to captivate listeners & get results. It includes dynamic video, interactive practice lessons, tips from industry leaders, and downloadable PDFs. Each component is designed to be completed in short time allotments, or all at once, to suit your schedule. It will take approximately 1 hour to complete both courses.

We've set you up with the foundations to create a memorable presentation through storytelling; all you have to do is deliver it!
title: Tell Your Business Story & Deliver Engaging Presentations
